name: Never Fail Pie Crust-Aunt Donna
steps: Put flour and salt in a bowl. Cut in cold shortening and margarine till crumbly.
Put egg in 1 c. measuring cup. Add vinegar and milk to fill cup, mix.
Mix liquid into dry ingredients until forms a ball. Knead on surface (doesn't get tough).
Chill at least 1 hour for best results. Keeps in fridge several days, keeps in freezer well.
